我们强调精心的呼吸护理.

sentences.en: Want to know how to spell assiduous?

trans.tran_cn: 刻苦的，勤勉的，殷勤的，百折不挠的
trans.tran_en: Someone who is assiduous works hard or does things very thoroughly
